tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE criminal_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    criminal_name VARCHAR,
    crime VARCHAR,
    arrest_date DATE,
    officer_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE CriminalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    criminal_name VARCHAR(50),
    crime_type VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_crime DATE,
    prison_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Investigations (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investigating_officer VARCHAR(50),
    case_status VARCHAR(20),
    criminal_id INT,
    case_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE criminal_records (
    case_number SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    criminal_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    crime_type TEXT,
    date_of_crime DATE,
    location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number INT REFERENCES criminal_records(case_number),
    officer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    action_taken TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Criminals (
    criminal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    criminal_name VARCHAR(255),
    criminal_age INT,
    criminal_gender VARCHAR(10),
    criminal_crime VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_description TEXT,
    case_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Investigators (
    investigator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(255),
    investigator_department VARCHAR(50),
    investigator_rank VARCHAR(20),
    investigator_badge_number VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Evidence (
    evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
    evidence_description TEXT,
    evidence_location VARCHAR(255)
)
CREATE TABLE criminals ( id INT, name VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(20), crime VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE cases ( case_id INT, case_name VARCHAR(255), case_description TEXT, assigned_officer VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE evidence ( evidence_id INT, case_id INT, evidence_type VARCHAR(50), description TEXT, location VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE officers ( officer_id INT, name VARCHAR(255), badge_number VARCHAR(20), rank VARCHAR(50), department VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE departments ( department_id INT, department_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), total_officers INT, budget DECIMAL(10, 2) );
